credit_line: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
title: Hans Arp - Hugo Ball
provenance: Acquired new and directly from designers, museums, and cultural institutions by Marc Benda.  Remained with Benda until 2010, when gifted to CHNDM.
description: On yellow background, along right edge two black-and-white photographs of men in paper-and-cardboard costumes, a purple anthropomorphized octopus shape layered on top. Inscription: in white, "kunsthaus zurich", followed by black text: " 5. juli-7.september 1986 / dishtungen / illustrierte bucher / zeichnungen / collagen / reliefs / skulpturen", then mid-page break to large-type "hans arp / hugo ball", then small type as before: "dadaist, / philosoph und / dichter", and finally at bottom: "offnungszeiten: / montag 14-17 uhr / dienstag bis freitag 10-21 uhr / samstag und sonntag 10-17 uhr / freitag, 1. august 1986 geschlossen".
name: Poster
